#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
struct score
{
  unsigned long long int mul;
  long long int index;
};
int compare(const void *a,const void *b)
{
    struct score *ia=(struct score*)a;
    struct score *ib=(struct score*)b;
    if(ia->mul>ib->mul)
        return 1;
    else if (ia->mul<ib->mul)
            return -1;
    else
    {
        if(ia->index>ib->index)
            return -1;
        else
            return 1;
    }
}
int main()
{
    struct score s[10001];
    long long int i,n,sc,m,q,k;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld %lld",&sc,&m);
            s[i].mul=sc*m;
            s[i].index=i+1;
        }
    qsort(s,n,sizeof(struct score),compare);
        scanf("%lld",&q);
        while(q--)
           {
               scanf("%lld",&k);
               printf("%lld\n",s[n-k].index);
           }
        return 0;
}
